00027 public class TFIDFComparator implements Comparator<Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>>> {
00028     
00047     public int compare(Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>> A, Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>> B) {
00048         
00055         double cosA = (Double) A.getKey().get("Distance");
00056         double cosB = (Double) B.getKey().get("Distance");
00057         if (cosA > cosB) {
00058             return -1;
00059         } else if (cosA == cosB) {
00060             return 0;
00061         } else {
00062             return 1;
00063         }
00064     }
00065     
00076     public static void calculateCosine(LinkedList<Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>> trainingSet, Map<String, Double> query) {
00077         
00090         Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>> entryQuery=new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>>(null,query);
00091         trainingSet.add(entryQuery);
00092         double TFIDF;
00099         List<Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>>> copyTrainingSet=new LinkedList<Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>>();
00100         Map<String, Double> currentDocumentHistogram;
00106         Map<String, Integer> IDF = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
00107         Integer absFrequencyCurrentTerm;
00111         int totalNumberDocuments = trainingSet.size();
00115         for(Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> currentEntry : trainingSet) {
00116             
00121             currentDocumentHistogram=new HashMap<String, Double>();
00122             currentDocumentHistogram.putAll(currentEntry.getValue());
00123             for (String Token : currentDocumentHistogram.keySet()) {
00124                 if (IDF.get(Token) == null) {
00132                     absFrequencyCurrentTerm = 0;
00133                     for (int j = 0; j < totalNumberDocuments; j++) {
00134                         if (trainingSet.get(j).getValue().get(Token) != null) {
00135                             absFrequencyCurrentTerm++;
00136                         }
00137                     }
00138                     IDF.put(Token, totalNumberDocuments / absFrequencyCurrentTerm);
00139                 }
00140                 TFIDF = currentDocumentHistogram.get(Token) * Math.log10(IDF.get(Token));
00141                 currentDocumentHistogram.put(Token, TFIDF);
00142             }
00143             copyTrainingSet.add(new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>>(currentEntry.getKey(),currentDocumentHistogram));
00144             if(currentEntry==entryQuery) {
00145                 entryQuery.setValue(currentDocumentHistogram);
00146             }
00147         }
00148         trainingSet.remove(entryQuery);
00153         totalNumberDocuments--;
00157         double twoNormQuery = twoNorm(entryQuery.getValue());
00158         for (int i = 0; i < totalNumberDocuments; i++) {
00159             currentDocumentHistogram = copyTrainingSet.get(i).getValue();
00160             double distance=scalarProduct(entryQuery.getValue(), currentDocumentHistogram) / (twoNorm(currentDocumentHistogram) * twoNormQuery);
00161             trainingSet.get(i).getKey().put("Distance", distance);
00162             trainingSet.get(i).getKey().put("Angle",Math.toDegrees(Math.acos(distance)));
00163         }
00164     }
00165     
00174     private static double scalarProduct(Map<String, Double> A, Map<String, Double> B) {
00175         
00176         double product = 0.0;
00177         Set<String> intersection = new HashSet<String>();
00178         intersection.addAll(A.keySet());
00185         if (A != B) {
00186             intersection.retainAll(B.keySet());
00187         }
00188         for (String token : intersection) {
00189             product += (A.get(token) * B.get(token));
00190         }
00191         return product;
00192     }
00193     
00201     private static double twoNorm(Map<String, Double> V) {
00202         return Math.sqrt(scalarProduct(V, V));
00203     }
00204 }
